title: Interpretation of dreams to hear songs in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about hearing songs in a dream. We will explain the most prominent scholars’ interpretations about what the interpretation of a dream about hearing songs in a dream suggests and whether it is good or not, all of this and much more. If a married woman is seen listening to songs and The sound is bad in a dream, as this may be evidence of bad news, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl is seen listening to songs and the sound of the songs is beautiful in the dream, then it may be good news, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a crazy girl in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a girl Crazy in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a crazy girl in a dream could be evidence that you are thinking about it and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a crazy girl in a dream, this could be a sign of trouble and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees a woman Crazy in a dream, this may indicate the presence of a problem, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my mother burning in a dream. Where he can express that he seeks help from those close to him, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her father burning, this may lead to happiness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my daughter burning in a dream. Interpretation of dreams in which I see my daughter burning in a dream could be a sign of good changes, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees his daughter burning, it saves him from trouble, and God knows best. The greatest and most knowledgeable: When a married woman sees her daughter burning in a dream, this may indicate changes in the daughter, and God knows the unseen. It may also represent the happiness of the daughter’s marriage, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about my wife burning in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my wife burning in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing a woman burning In a dream, it could be a sign of anxiety, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a burning woman in a dream, this may be evidence of sins and disobedience, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. title: Interpretation of a dream about drowning in the sea and emerging from it

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about drowning in the sea and emerging from itInterpretation of a dream about drowning in the sea and emerging from it is one of the most disturbing dreams, as a person feels that he is drowning, has difficulty breathing, and appears to be actually dying, and God Almighty has mentioned drowning in many verses. . What is the interpretation of a dream about drowning in the sea? Is it good or bad for the viewer? You can follow the article on the interpretation of a dream about drowning in the sea and getting out of it through: Otherwise. Interpretation of a dream about saving someone from drowning for a single woman. When an unmarried girl sees herself drowning in a dream, this vision indicates that this girl is drowning in The pleasures of life and that she is one of those girls who only cares about her appearance and does not follow her teachings. religion. If an unmarried girl was able to survive drowning in the sea, then this vision shows this girl’s ability to survive the evils and troubles that she went through at that time. Ibn Sirin says that drowning in a dream indicates that she has many bad friends who can harm her and should be avoided. Interpretation of a dream about drowning in the sea and getting rid of it, according to Nabulsi’s scholar, is that whoever sees himself drowning in a dream sees that this vision shows the abundance of knowledge and knowledge that characterizes the dreamer, while Ibn Shaheen believes that drowning in a dream may mean that the dreamer will get sick soon. Ibn Sirin believes that surviving drowning in a dream indicates that the dreamer will overcome the problems and crises that he will face in the coming period.Interpretation of a dream about drowning in the seaInterpretation of dreams about drowning in the sea and emerging from it If a mother sees her daughter drowning in a dream, this vision indicates that this girl needs... To her mother emotionally. A girl's room in a dream could be a sign of her failure in school and that the mother and father need to take care of her. If the girl drowns in stagnant or polluted water, this vision indicates many problems and fears in the visionary's life. If the girl manages to survive drowning in Dreaming, this vision indicates that the girl will get rid of the problems and crises of the past. When a married woman sees her husband drowning in a dream, this vision indicates that the husband is involved in public life with his wife. If a married woman sees that her husband is drowning in her dream, this means That the husband will fall into some financial problems in the future, and if he is able to get rid of drowning, he will get rid of this problem. Ibn Shirin believes that the husband’s drowning in a dream indicates that he is busy raising his children and leaving the responsibility to the mother only. Interpretation of a dream about drowning in the sea and dying. Interpretation of dreams: Drowning In and out of the sea Some dream interpreters believe that drowning and dying in a dream portends an increase in a merchant’s money. Other dream interpreters believe that drowning in a dream means getting rid of worries and problems in the dreamer’s life. Ibn Sirin believes that death by drowning in a dream indicates the end of a bad period that is currently present. In the dreamer’s life. As for Al-Nabulsi, he believes that drowning and death in a dream means cleansing the dreamer from past sins. When the dreamer sees that he is drowning in the lake, this vision is a warning to him and an alert to give up.

title: Interpretation of a dream about lice in a husband’s hair

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of lice in the husband’s hair in a dream When we search for the interpretation of the dream of lice in the husband’s hair in a dream and we find that it is one of the dreams that some people want to know its interpretation, let us get to know the interpretations of the working scholars for this dream and the reader must know that the site managers do not provide interpretations, but From the heart, interpretations of some scholars. Interpretation of a dream about lice in the husband’s hair in a dream: The presence of lice in the husband’s hair in a dream may indicate major differences between them during this period. Whoever sees in a dream the presence of lice in her husband’s hair could indicate a financial crisis that the husband may be exposed to during This period. A dream about lice in the husband’s hair in a dream may indicate a lot of thinking and tension that he feels during those days. It is possible to see lice in the wedding hair in a dream, which indicates some of the worries and suffering that the wife suffered at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating fish for the husband in a dream: Eating fish in a dream may indicate the extensive diet that the husband may have during this period. If a woman sees that her husband was eating fish, this may indicate positive changes that occurred in his life during this period. Vision Eating fish in a dream may indicate happy events that the husband may receive in the coming days. If a person sees himself eating fish in a dream, this may indicate that he is afflicted with a disease, then he will get rid of it at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband running on green land in A dream: Seeing the wife working on a green land may mean that she will get a lot of money in those days. Whoever dreams that the husband was running on a green land may indicate great wealth that he can acquire after the poverty he suffered from. Dreaming of a husband running on a green land in a dream It may indicate repentance for the sins and disobedience committed by the husband, and God knows best. When you see your wife lying on green ground in a dream, this may indicate positive changes occurring in your life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband eating his wife’s meat in a dream: It may indicate that the husband is eating His wife’s meat in a dream indicates that he will receive a lot of halal money during this period. Eating his wife’s meat in a dream can indicate attaining power or promotion at work during this time, and God knows best. If one sees the husband eating his wife’s meat in a dream, This may indicate many changes that occur in those days, thanks to God. Seeing a husband eating his wife’s meat in a dream may indicate that she is a woman of good character and appearance, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about drinking milk for the husband in a dream: If you see the husband eating milk in a dream, this may indicate that This indicates that he is a person who helps others a lot in their lives. Dreaming that the husband is eating milk in a dream may indicate the coming goodness of the marriage with God’s grace. Whoever sees in her dream that her husband was drinking milk, it may indicate that she will get rid of the worries and problems that she has suffered from for a long time Perhaps seeing the husband eating milk in a dream indicates positive changes

title: A black dog bites in a dream

preview.html: For this we will learn in detail by reading the following lines from the website of the interpreter of dreams and visions. Follow us. Interpretation of seeing a black dog bite in a dream for one girl. Evidence that she will see an unsuitable person for her engagement. She should think carefully before making any decision. Dreaming of a black dog approaching a single woman is evidence that she is unlucky in her life and will receive unpleasant news. Interpretation of seeing a black dog that an unmarried girl runs away from, evidence However, she overcame many difficulties. Seeing a black dog being chased in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates her extreme anxiety and she must calm down and think a lot. Seeing a black dog in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of the presence of her disreputable friends around her, and they are conspiring against her and many others. Of fraud. Likewise, a girl who sees in her dream a dog attacking her and some people standing around is evidence that she is facing a problem and a failed romantic relationship. A black dog biting a single girl is evidence that she is suffering psychological pain and her engagement will be cancelled. Also, seeing a black dog biting An unmarried girl is evidence that she did not choose well from her fiancé because he is cheating on her. While an unmarried girl sees a black dog rushing towards her while running, this is evidence that she hears news that hurts her. Likewise, a black dog running after an unmarried woman in a dream indicates that she will Store it and that its burden will be heavy for some time. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a dog bite. Interpretation of watching a black dog bite in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees in her dream a dog standing on top of each other indicates that there is an unloved person in her life. A married woman dreams of a black dog biting her This is a sign of her husband’s betrayal and she is asking him for a divorce. However, a married woman who sees a gray dog ​​in a dream indicates that there is someone in the family who hates her. A married woman who sees a brown dog in her dream indicates that there is someone near her who will value her. Likewise, The presence of a black dog in a married woman’s dream indicates the presence of bad friends in her life who do not love her. A married woman who sees a dog biting her is evidence that her husband is taking her money unlawfully and that he is corrupt. The interpretation of seeing a black dog biting in a dream for a man and its meaning. A man who sees a dog biting him in a dream indicates To the presence of a disabled woman in his life. The presence of a large number of dogs that bit a man in his dream is evidence that there are many haters around him. A person who sees a dog in a dream but does not harm him means that he will spend a new and good life. Likewise, a man who dreams that he drinks Milk from a prostitute, this indicates that he is subjected to great oppression and injustice. Also, to dream of a man being bitten by a dog on his body, this means that he is suffering from problems with his wife. A dog bite in an unmarried man’s dream is evidence that he will prevail over everyone who hates him and the envy of those around him. Likewise, the man who sees the dog

title: What is the interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream for a single woman?

preview.html: Sweets in a dream for single women A dream that has many interpretations, knowing that sweets have many types and kinds, and seeing each type in a dream has a specific interpretation and meaning explained through this article. Sweets in a dream for single women Sweets in a dream for single women by Ibn Sirin If a single woman sees in her dream a group of sweets that she likes, then this dream symbolizes - according to what Ibn Sirin said - that she will enter into a new love story in the coming days that will improve her psychological state. Seeing someone offering her a plate of sweets that she loves symbolizes that he really loves her and wants to get closer to her. Sweets in anyone's dream symbolize the arrival of happy news soon that will make her happy and the happiness of all her family members. If she dreams that she is eating a delicious sweet and is happy with its taste, this means marriage or that she will excel in her studies or work. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by senior scholars of interpretation. The most important interpretations of seeing sweets in a dream for a single woman For anyone who dreams that she is eating sweets, this symbolizes an improvement in her life, whether it is her academic, professional or emotional life. Knowing that seeing sweets in a dream in general indicates the end of anxiety and anxiety. Seeing sweets symbolizes a halal diet and opening the doors of nutrition for the dreamer. When a girl sees that she is eating sweets, this symbolizes that something good will happen in her life, or that she will make a fateful decision and there is no need to worry about the difficulties she will face. Sweets in the dream of an unmarried woman are evidence of recovery from an illness she has suffered from for a long time or the recovery of someone close to her. Eating a lot of sweets is not a good vision because the abundance of sweets indicates a serious illness or a problem with someone. Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets in a dream for a single woman Many commentators argue that seeing sweets in a single dream means that you will soon communicate with a good person and that you will be very happy to be with him. Seeing sweets in more than one color is a sign that hearing a lot of good news is imminent. Buying sweets in a dream, a single woman Some interpreters see that seeing the purchase of sweets by paying a lot of money is evidence that the seer is wasting and spending a lot of money without calculation or care. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is buying sweets, this dream is evidence of her approaching marriage to a righteous person who loves her and cares for her God. Buying sweets In a dream, it is evidence of the emergence of many opportunities, whether in personal or professional life, and the dreamer must take advantage of them well and indicate the presence of many righteous people around him. Interpretation of a dream about making sweets in a dream for a single woman Making sweets in a dream and offering them to others is evidence of providing a lot of help without expecting anything in return and getting rid of negative feelings and feeling satisfied with oneself. Selling sweets according to the interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq indicates a good job opportunity in the future. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that

title: Interpretation of seeing lice in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: And that there were people who raped him, and in the following lines from our interpreter’s website we will talk in detail about seeing lice in a dream, so follow us to learn more. Interpretation of seeing lice in a dream for a single girlIf a girl sees lice in her dream. This indicates that this single girl will marry someone Do not accept him and you will live in sadness and illusion. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that there are lice on her dress. This vision indicates that there will be disagreements between her and her family or someone she loves. When a single girl sees a lot of lice in her hair. This indicates that this A single girl does a lot of trouble and things that God does not approve of. But if a girl sees in her dream that there are a lot of lice in her hair. This vision indicates that this girl will suffer from many diseases. She will live a difficult life, sadness, delusions, and bad financial conditions. If she sees An unmarried girl sees in her dream that a lot of lice is coming out of her hair and it is white. This indicates that someone from her family will leave the house. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that there is a lice in her hair. This indicates that this girl will delay marriage. title: Learn about the interpretation of giving dead coins in a dream to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead person giving coins in a dream. Seeing a dead person is one of the visions that worries some people, such as the terror that a person feels at the time of death or the death of those close to him. This vision has many repercussions, and we are interested in it. In giving money in a dream, this vision has many interpretations that vary based on different considerations, such as: The gift can be from the dead or the living. What we will review in this article are all the indications and special cases of seeing the dead giving coins. Learn about the interpretation of giving Dead coins in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of giving dead coins. Seeing the dead embodies preaching, correctness and guidance, awakening from neglect, realizing the truth and essence of the world. He begins to think carefully about all events and carefully plans every step forward. If you see the dead giving you money, this expresses the trust that is placed In you, the desires that you could not satisfy and have the ability to achieve, the successive changes in life, moving from one place to another and from another place. And the end of the great tribulation. But if you give money to the dead, this means giving charity to his soul, praying for him, having mercy on him, doing everything in his power for his happiness in the afterlife, visiting him often, and doing good deeds in his name. May God forgive him for his past and future sins. This vision can also be an indication of paying off debts, fulfilling a need, achieving goal and purpose, beginning to respond to the requirements of the current stage, dealing professionally with current events, avoiding empty talk and nonsense, and meditating on the signs. The universe. But if the dead dreamer gives him a lot of money, which is a metal like a dinar, then this expresses relief from adversity and adversity, freedom from the dangers that threaten his life and future, and freedom from serious worries and sorrow. This vision is also an indication of confronting the oppressors and achieving victory over them, Benefiting from the great benefit, the death of imminent misfortunes and evil, the end of a serious economic crisis, and a feeling of psychological comfort, tranquility and peace. Explanation of handing over dead coins by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the dead expresses truth, certainty and honesty. What you see of the dead at work is essentially the truth that you lack or the knowledge that you previously ignored and the awareness of inner things and the secrets of life. If you see the dead person doing a good deed, he urges you to do it, and urges you to do it to the fullest extent, but if you see him doing a bad deed This is a warning to you to stay away from that. And stay away from suspicion and everything that tends to lead to the destruction of others, because it prevents you. But if he sees the deceased giving him coins, this represents a release from his worries and severe anxiety, a liberation from the restrictions that prevented him from living normally, and the removal of an obstacle that prevented him from his desired desires and goals. And if One saw that he is giving coins to the dead person, this indicates his merits in relation to him and the money spent

title: Interpretation of seeing a wardrobe in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a wardrobe in a dream, a wardrobe is a place designated for putting and arranging clothes in it, and seeing a wardrobe in a dream can be a good sign or it can be a warning or a warning of an evil incident for a pregnant or divorced woman with its various meanings, and today through the Vision website we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a wardrobe in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of senior interpreters such as Ibn. Sirin or Ibn Kathir or Al-Nabulsi or Imam Al-Sadiq, follow us. Interpretation of dropping a wardrobe Ibn Sirin Seeing a wardrobe in a dream full of clothes indicates psychological and moral stability. Seeing an empty wardrobe indicates that the dreamer suffers from something in his life. Seeing a man’s wardrobe in a dream symbolizes what happened in his past life. Seeing a woman’s wardrobe full of clothes indicates good news for her soon. Seeing an empty wardrobe alone indicates the instability of her emotional life. Interpretation of seeing a wheel in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Seeing a wardrobe empty of clothes symbolizes the emptiness in which he lives or the crisis he is going through. Seeing a wardrobe in a dream indicates the dreamer’s need for attention and tenderness, as the emptiness of the wheel indicates the dreamer’s loss of tenderness and attention. Interpretation of seeing clothes arranged in a dream A single woman sees disheveled clothes on the shelves, which expresses fear, tension, and the absence of anything in the girl’s life. Messy clothes on shelves in the wardrobe in a dream indicate the blood of stability in the dreamer’s life and the presence of some problems that cause him anxiety and confusion. Seeing clothes arranged in a dream means rearranging things in the dreamer’s life and restoring his normal life as it was Before. Interpretation of seeing clothes from the closet in a dream Seeing yourself collecting clothes in a dream from the closet shows that the dreamer saves a lot of money and cares about it. I see myself picking up clothes from the closet in a dream indicates the instability of the married life of the couple. I see myself picking up clothes from the closet in a dream It suggests the viewer's tension and his constant fear of the future. Interpretation of seeing buying a new wardrobe Seeing buying a new wardrobe in a single woman's dream indicates that he will get married soon. Seeing buying a new wardrobe for a married woman in a dream heralds her new pregnancy. Buying a closet full of fruits It indicates the stability of life and life in prosperity for the visionary. Interpretation of a dream about a wooden wardrobe Seeing a full wooden wardrobe in a dream Braid with a large diet and a lot of money. Looking at an empty wooden wardrobe indicates the narrow condition of the dreamer that makes him poor. Seeing a wooden wardrobe in a dream Show a lot of good and spacious food comes to the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about an old wardrobe in a dream Seeing the old wardrobe empty It indicates that the dreamer is going through a period of emptiness and loss in his life. Seeing the old wardrobe empty It indicates that some negative changes will occur in the dreamer's life and that he will be exposed to many problems. Seeing an empty wardrobe in a dream In reality, it was The seer is anxious, indicating that his troubles may

title: Interpretation of hitting a child in a dream and its meaning for good and evil according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of hitting a child in a dreamHere is an explanation of hitting a child in a dream. Child abuse is one of the most common crimes committed by many, whether the child’s parents or others, as this act leaves negative effects on the child’s psyche and makes him tend toward aggression and violence, as well as a permanent loss of self-confidence and feeling. Scared, and some may see in their dreams that they are beating children or that someone is beating their children, so what does a dream mean that they are beating children? Is this vision true or is it from Satan? We will explain this through the following lines in the encyclopedia. A dream about hitting a child symbolizes the dreamer’s need to review his actions and think carefully before making any decision. Because this dream expresses that the dreamer is committing many sins and transgressions and making wrong decisions in his life. If someone sees in his dream that He hits a child, does he know that? His vision showed that he was very afraid for this child and asked for his guidance. When one dreams that he brutally beats a child, he knows it. This means that the dreamer is suffering from social problems with this child. Seeing a child hitting his hand in a dream means that the dreamer is getting something that is not his right. This vision also indicates that its owner has gained a bad reputation as a result of the wrong actions he commits in reality. However, if The dreamer hit the child with his hand in a dream unnecessarily. This vision is an indication that its owner is trying to help this child change his life for the better. Whoever sees in his dream that he is hitting a child knows this in the face. This dream indicates that there is a problem that will happen to this child as a result of the fortuneteller’s wrong actions. Interpretation of a dream about hitting a child that I do not know. If someone sees in his dream that he is hitting a child, then he does not know whose hand it is. His vision showed that he treats others unfairly. Interpretation of a dream about a child being beaten by an unmarried woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is slapping a child in a dream. This vision indicates that she will enter into an emotional relationship that will cause her many problems. Interpretation of a dream about a child hitting a woman: If the dreamer is married and sees in her dream that she is hitting an unknown child with her hand. This vision shows that she is not satisfied with her life with her husband. Who sees in her dream that she is hitting a child when she is already pregnant? This means that she will face problems with her pregnancy in the coming period. When a divorced woman sees a child being beaten, she does not know it. This vision is evidence that someone will lust after him, so he should be careful. Interpretation of a dream about hitting my son: If someone sees in his dream that he is hitting his son; It means that his son will benefit from him. This dream also shows that the owner loves his child very much and fears for him. Whoever sees in a dream that he is hitting his son on the back. His vision showed that he was trying to raise his son well and feared his corruption. Interpretation of a dream about a mother hitting her son in a dreamWhen a mother sees in her dream that she is hitting her son. This means that this son will benefit from insight in reality. If the mother hits her child unnecessarily in the dream. This means that she really cares about her child's affairs. Whoever sees in a dream that she is hitting her child's face. Her vision showed that this child was disobeying her orders and not carrying them out. If the dreamer was alive
